SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

de.unisiegen.tpml.graphics
Class Theme

java.lang.Object
  AbstractBean
      de.unisiegen.tpml.graphics.Theme

public final class Theme
extends AbstractBean

The theme settings that control the color and the font of the renderers and the editor. The theme settings can be changed from the preferences dialog. The settings are implemented as bean properties and the renderers and editors should stay informed about changes to the theme via PropertyChangeListeners. The Theme class has only a single instance, which is allocated on-demand and returned by the currentTheme() class method.

Version:
$Rev: 526 $
Author:
Marcell Fischbach, Benedikt Meurer
See Also:
de.unisiegen.tpml.core.util.beans.Bean, PropertyChangeListener

Constructor Detail

Theme

private Theme()
Allocates a new Theme. There's exactly one instance of the Theme class, which is returned by the currentTheme() class method.

See Also:
currentTheme()
Method Detail

currentTheme

public static Theme currentTheme()
Returns the single instance of the Theme class, which is allocated on-demand, that is, on the first invocation of this class method, and stays alive for the live time of the application.

Returns:
the current theme.

encodeColor

private static final String encodeColor(Color color)
Encodes the color in its hexadecimal string representation, which is #[red][green][blue], where the channels are encoded as 2 hex characters.

Parameters:
color - the Color to encode
Returns:
the string representation of color.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if color is null.
